name: MFPS (King 0101)
description:
Welcome to MFPS!

What MFPS? Mfps is multiplayer game, 

Battle your friends or anyone from anywhere in the world 

Movement. Use the arrow keys to move, use the mouse to look around 

Use the quick play feature to quickly get into a game, or create custom games and set it up however you like.

MFPS  is being constantly updated with new features and improvements, so check back often! And most of all - have fun!

-king

Developer
